description:
This app brings your bookmark collection from your desktop browser to your phone.

It syncs all folders and bookmarks via Opera Link, a service provided by the Opera desktop browser. You need to have the Opera Browser installed on your computer (go to opera.com) and you need to have a free Opera Link account to use this app. You can import your bookmarks from Firefox and Internet Explorer into the Opera browser to take advantage of the features of this app.

It does currently not support the editing of folders & bookmarks.

##########
# Changelog: #
##########
Version 1.2.0:
new Features:
- Just Type Search for webOS >2.0, enable it in Just Type Preferences (type something and scroll down to the end to find preferences)
- Search trough all bookmarks within the app
- Sort your folders
- App is now compatible with Touchpad and Pre3

Version 1.1.0:
Bugfixes:
- large Download fails
- Device slow/ hung up during Download
- long foldernames linebreak

new Features:
- launch bookmarks in 3rd party browser (Universe or Complete Browser)
- quick launch through dashboard
